name: Yammer for Xero
description: Yammer may have a tad too many features.
additional_info:
Changelog
Version 1.2
 - Damn you Yammer and your release early, release often mantra. You keep breaking my stuff.
 - Top header is now unhidden, and you can search for stuff again.

Version 1.1
 - Yammer changed the class for adding the global font.
 - Networks are now back and visible, since there may be more networking.
 - Includes Mr Denton's style to make the page pop, much better!

There's an option for disabling gif's too if these grind your gears. Change the "block" to "none" to obliterate the gifs!
